resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107401</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107401</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205718</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Big Read</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Grosse Gelesen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Grand Lu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Grande Lido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Grande Colto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο μεγάλος που διαβάζεται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Grande Leído</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site encourages communities to read and discuss novels. Teacher guides, discussion questions, and other information are provided for Fahrenheit 451, My �ntonia The Great Gatsby, The Maltese Falcon, A Farewell to Arms, Their Eyes Were Watching God, To Kill a Mockingbird, The Heart is a Lonely Hunter, The Grapes of Wrath, The Joy Luck Club, The Age of Innocence, and Bless Me, Ultima.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site regt Gemeinschaften an, Romane zu 
lesen und zu behandeln. Lehreranleitungen, Diskussion Fragen und
andere Informationen werden für Fahrenheit 451, mein?ntonia das 
große Gatsby, der maltesische Falke, ein Abschied zu den Armen, ihre 
Augen überwachten Gott, um eine Spottdrossel zu beenden, das Innere 
sind ein einsamer Jäger, die Trauben des Zorns, die Freude 
Glück-Verein, das Alter von Unschuld, und mich, Ultima zu segnen zur 
Verfügung gestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site encourage les communautés à lire et 
discuter des romans. Des guides de professeur, les questions de 
discussion, et toute autre information sont donnés pour Fahrenheit 
451, mon ?ntonia le grand Gatsby, le faucon maltais, un adieu aux 
bras, leurs yeux observaient Dieu, pour détruire un moqueur, le coeur
est un chasseur seul, les raisins de la colère, le club de chance de 
joie, l'âge de l'innocence, et pour me bénir, Ultima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local incentiva comunidades ler e discutir 
novelas. As guias do professor, as perguntas da discussão, e a 
outra informação são fornecidas para Fahrenheit 451, meu?ntonia o 
Gatsby grande, o falcão maltese, um farewell aos braços, seus olhos 
prestavam atenção ao deus, para matar um mockingbird, o coração 
são um caçador só, as uvas do wrath, clube da sorte da alegria, a 
idade do innocence, e para bless me, Ultima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo consiglia alle Comunità leggere e 
discutere i romanzi. Le guide dell'insegnante, le domande di 
discussione ed altre informazioni sono fornite per Fahrenheit 451, il 
mio?ntonia il Gatsby grande, il falco maltese, un addio 
all'Armi, i loro occhi stavano guardando il dio, per uccidere 
un mockingbird, il cuore è un cacciatore solo, l'uva di wrath, il 
randello di fortuna di gioia, l'età di innocence e per benedirle, 
Ultima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή ενθαρρύνει τις κοινότητες για να 
διαβάσει και να συζητήσει τα μυθιστορήματα. Οι οδηγοί 
δασκάλων, οι ερωτήσεις συζήτησης, και άλλες πληροφορίες 
παρέχονται για fahrenheit 451, το ?ntonia μου το μεγάλο 
Gatsby, το της Μάλτα γεράκι, ένα αντίο στα όπλα, τα μάτια 
τους πρόσεχαν το Θεό, για να σκοτώσει ένα Mockingbird, η 
καρδιά είναι μόνος κυνηγός, τα σταφύλια της οργής, η λέσχη 
τύχης χαράς, η ηλικία της αθωότητας, και με ευλογεί, Ultima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio anima a comunidades que lean y 
discutan las novelas. Las guías del profesor, las preguntas de 
la discusión, y la otra información se proporcionan para Fahrenheit 
451, mi?ntonia el gran Gatsby, el halcón maltés, un adiós a los 
brazos, sus ojos miraban a dios, para matar a un mockingbird, el 
corazón es un cazador solo, las uvas de la cólera, el club de la 
suerte de la alegría, la edad de la inocencia, y para bendecirme, 
Ultima.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205718</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107401</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-big-read</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
